title: Iran foreign minister reveals John Kerry kept in touch about Israeli covert operations
content:
1. Iran foreign minister reveals John Kerry kept in touch about Israeli covert operations  New York Post
  2. Iran's foreign minister criticises Soleimani's power in leaked audio  TRT World
